reviewText: Very good value and fast delivery thank you very much
This will make you Horney, plus crazy story with to much poo and stuff.

My main problem with this film is that it is improperly described. As listed you would think this is a variation of the harem style, however it is about as far from that as possible. This is a Rape\Revenge Fantasy title and there was NOTHING to indicate that. If you are into that type of story it works just fine, however this would be vastly improved if it was indicated as such. I would not buy it again because I believe that the customer should know what they are getting, especially in the field of Hentai.

This hentai has really bad dialogue but the fun kind of  bad it supid, poorly written and stilled but if you wanted Good dialogue why are you watching a Hentai. The animation it average at best and no one scene really stands out .Its a 60 minute hentai but theres no really Good scene theres no really bad scenes ether its a veraverage hentai take from that what you will
For this anime it had a good story of one mans revenge and his greatest fantasy. Over all it was good but it is only for adults only, absolutely not for children under 18 period!!!

This ero story, actually has a decent story, albeit a bit cliche. The animation is realitively decent.
It's no bible black, but at least its striving to a certain quality standard. The details, the line work, is pretty fair. And your imagination will not be left doing most of the work for you when watching.

It was a purchase I would make again.

The cover of the DVD is kind of lacking though. I remember being leery before buying this, but was glad I did. It's ranking near angel blade detail/animation quality.., ranking a little below that.
